Q_DESC:
Chef has a undirected graph G. This graph consists of N vertices and M edges. Each vertex of the graph has an unique index from 1 to N, also each edge of the graph has an unique index from 1 to M.

Also Chef has Q pairs of integers:. For each pair Li, Ri, Chef wants to know: how many connected components will contain graph G if Chef erase all the edges from the graph, except the edges with indies X, where Li <= X <= Ri. Please, help Chef with these queries.
